+-------------------------------[Release Notes]------------------------------+
|                                                                            |
|  'Fight With Tools' is the third full length release from the Colorado     |
|  rock/hip-hop band Flobots. The band's inventive fusion has earned the     |
|  single 'Handelbars' substantial radio plays with its catchy, energetic    |
|  sound. The album itself showcases more of this genre-mixing, utilising    |
|  occasionally sparing hip-hop beats and diverse instrumentation, all       |
|  under the fluid deliveries of the band's two main MCs Johnny 5 and Brer   |
|  Rabbit. Weighty themes are juxtaposed with light observations, all        |
|  resulting in a tremendously entertaining amalgam of genres.               |
|                                                                            |
|                     |
|                                                                            |
|  Can't we all ride our bikes without handlebars? n00bs.                    |
|                                                                            |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
